mapper.insert: insert into free_comment (f_idx, fc_id, fc_user, fc_comment, fc_class, fc_group, fc_num, fc_date) values (#{f_idx}, #{fc_id}, #{fc_user}, #{fc_comment}, #{fc_class}, #{fc_group}, #{fc_num}, now())
mapper.select: select max(fc_group) from free_comment where f_idx = #{f_idx}
select max(fc_num) from free_comment where f_idx = #{f_idx} and fc_group = #{fc_group}
select fc_id from free_comment where fc_idx = #{fc_idx}
